fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: This variable indicates whether someone on our coding team read the constitutional event in a non-English language and translated information in order to collect the necessary information.
fxInfo_question: For constitutions not available in English, did our coders translate the relevant sections of a non-English event?

fxInfo_responses.value: Yes, this event was translated by our team

fxInfo_sources: V-Dem coding of constitutional texts in CCP (Elkins et al. 2012).
name: v2juteamtr
